question: What is the purpose of the provided link?
answer: The provided link https://github.com/facebookresearch/detectron2/issues/new/choose is for selecting an issue template to report an issue for the Detectron2 project on GitHub.

question: What happens if an issue is submitted without using the provided issue template link?
answer: If an issue is submitted without using the provided issue template link, the issue will be closed.
